name: Tiny Jump (itch)
description:
Tiny Jump

**IMPORTANT**

After receiving feedback on the game, the game seems to not work properly on other computers. I will try my best to fix the issues, and I will let you know when the new release comes out. I will also release the source code if someone wants that. Before the new version, I would not recommend to download this version because of the game breaking bugs. Thanks for testing the game and for all the feedback! :)

**

Collect as many clouds as fast as possible! Your health bar constantly decreases when you don't hit a cloud, so you need to be quick!

Move with the arrow keys, and jump with the up-arrow key.

This game was made for learning C++ and a graphics library called SFML in a pretty short time period, so certain bugs can occur. I won't probably continue making this game, but follow me on twitter for my other upcoming games!

My twitter: https://twitter.com/AstronautenDev

Thanks for playing! :)
